"Great design, great materials, good people." "Quality equipment provided as well." "A few months later, some coping stones popped from the deck."

I can’t thank Scott and Cindi- and the rest of the crew at Leisure Living Pools - for getting my pool completed so quickly. After going through TWO other contractors who left my pool halfway finished (and then going MIA), Scott assured me … More

Can't recommend Leisure Living Pools enough. We had never built a pool before. Everything they did was 1st class. Our backyard was a sad afterthought. Once Leisure Living Pools did their thing, it was an oasis. Highly recommended. Response from the owner 6 years ago Thank you for the review Mr. Pascal! It was a pleasure to have the opportunity to transform your backyard into the oasis it is today!

We had Leisure Living Pool remodel our pool exactly 4 years ago. It would have been a nearly flawless experience, if it wasn’t for the terrible masonry job. We chose this builder even though they were the most expensive bid, assuming that … More Response from the owner a year ago Andrew,  while this reply was quite belated, it has bothered me bc it is quite uncustomary for us to get a negative review.  while we are not perfect we have worked hard for more than 40 years to do the best we can and
